title.rendered: “Israeli Air Force Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: Detailed Report on the IDF’s Successful Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a series of military targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon.

A short time ago, Israeli Air Force combat aircraft attacked a series of military targets belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon. Among the targets attacked were terror infrastructures, military buildings, a weapons warehouse, and a launch site of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

In response to alerts about the intrusion of a hostile aircraft in the northern part of the country, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspected aerial target that crossed from Lebanese territory towards Israel. Alerts about rocket and missile fire were activated due to fears of interception debris.

Footage from the attacks is attached: https://bit.ly/3GObL7t
